title: Unraveling
description: ***A new release by Amazon Top 10 Bestselling Author Angela M. Shrum***When college student Lauren Ross disappears from her home on Mercer Island, it’s up to her family to find her. With little to go on, Dylan Noel and her father, detective Timothy Carter, are yanked into a dangerous game of hide-and-seek. There aren’t enough clues and far too many suspects—all with solid reasons why they might want to hurt Lauren.Many residents in their private town refuse to help, desperate to keep their own skeletons hidden. Soon, Dylan is pulled into their devious world of manipulation, power, and scandal while she attempts to unravel the knotted thread of lies and cover-ups. Is she strong enough to find Lauren? Or will Dylan fall into a carefully laid trap and pay the ultimate price?
author: Angela M. Shrum
